data.text: Ndiyamikina kuidi Nzambi mu diambu di lusadusu
Thangu ndiba mu ziphasi, nditomba Yave ;
Ndietebukila moyo, a Nzambi, ayi ndikunga ;
Wekeba meso mama ma bika zibama,
Ndiyindula bilumbu bivioka, mimvu mi thama.
Ndieti tebukila minkunga miama moyo va builu,
Pfumu wela tumbu loza kuandi mvimba e ?
Luzolo luandi lungolo lusukidi kuandi mvimba e ?
Nzambi wuzimbikini kuandi buela monisa nlemvo e ?
Buna ndiyindula “mu diambu diadi ndiela singimina :
Ndiela tebukila moyo mavanga ma Yave,
Ndiela yindulanga mu tsi ntima bisalu biaku bioso ;
Zinzila ziaku, a Nzambi, zidi zinlongo ;
Ngeyo widi Nzambi yimvanganga bikumu ;
Mu koko kuaku ku lulendo wukuidila batu baku,
Minlangu mimmona, ngeyo a Nzambi !
Matuti madukula minlangu ;
Zinzazi ziaku ziwakana mu kimbongila ;
Nsolo aku wuviokila va khatitsika mbu,
Wudiatisa batu baku banga nkangu wu mamemi,
